annonstext:
We are looking for a Communications Specialist who is passionate about communication and working in an international environment. Position is located in Markaryd.

You will interact with many parts of the organization and will be expected to provide communication materials for various stakeholders, work on global and local communication activities, and ensure these are aligned with the overall corporate strategy. You will have the opportunity to work and take lead on many different projects. You will report directly to the Marketing and Communications Manager, BU Lift Trucks.

 

Your new role

	Plan communication objectives
	Prepare and adhere to budgets
	Producing content from concept through publication for different target groups
	Develop and execute internal communication activities
	Event management
	Oversee planning, creation, and delivery of press releases and editorials
	Deepen relationships with the media to ensure the most effective messaging and positioning of the organization
	Occasionally be the back-up for the Markaryd office reception; greeting visitors and manage the switchboard

All above will be in cooperation with your MarCom colleagues at KC lift trucks.

 

What you should bring

We are looking for a hands-on marketer with proven competency in managing projects and a minimum of 1+ years’ experience in communication. You will need to be highly self-motivated, proactive, and be able to work across a multitude of cultures.

	Bachelor’s degree or equivalent, in communications or another relevant field
	Excellent written and verbal communication skills in Swedish and English
	Capability to develop and implement sustainable communication development plans
	Service-minded and flexible working style
	Able to work independently as well as a member of a team
	Digital literacy, comfortable using MS office tools, digital tools, and media
	Video and photography skills are highly appreciated
	Native-level English is highly appreciated

 

Personal characteristics

	A good colleague and supportive team player
	Results-oriented and used to working with deadlines
	A flexible, positive, and professional approach
	Cooperative and service-minded
	A strategic doer
	Passion for learning, willingness to take on new challenges and share knowledge

 

We offer:

In return, we can offer you an exciting and challenging Communications Specialist position in a positive and flexible international working environment. We are a value-driven company with a long history and a stable financial situation. We work with the whole world as our market and ensure that our orders are managed directly according to the needs of the customers, and our high-tech products receive a variety of customer-specific customizations. We offer excellent opportunities for continuous skills development and an international career.

 

For more information about this position please contact: FIRSTNAME LASTNAME, Marketing and Communications Manager, telephone:  TELEPHONENO , email:  EMAIL
